We all know a jury acquittal means a person is innocent, right? LOL Yeah, and OJ was too.
Why would you post that picture? It only emphasizes the fact this murdered child will never receive justice -and look how her mommy is grinning about that! But THIS is the picture I will always remember of Casey Anthony -dancing in a hot body contest 4 days after her daughter died at her hands, shown here clearly "grief stricken". And PLEASE none of the idiocy about how everyone supposedly grieves differently. NOT TRUE. There is a range of display of emotions that is normal and may be different from person to person but the idea that dancing in a hot body contest is consistent with grief is ludicrous. Otherwise no one would know what the word "grief" even meant, would they? We know what the word "grief" looks like because we also know what is in that normal range. And in spite of every defense attorney since Cain's trying to convince a jury that no one can possibly know what grief looks like (which would make the word meaningless then), grief never looks like this.
THIS is not "grief" of any kind but Casey out celebrating after getting that damned albatross of a kid from around her neck and in the swamp. No justice for this murdered child and mommy can get back out there just in time for the next hot body contest.
